Message:
That is the name given
solely to The Luminary of Song.

She is admired by
all songstresses,
and is the leading lady
of the theater.

“We live in troubling times,
so I want my songs to lift
everyone’s spirits...

and embrace the world
with my songs of hope...”

Those were the words
she often spoke.

Before long, her wishes
had become my own.

One day, I shall become
a songstress like my mother,
and sing songs of hope
to the people of the world.

I still do not
hold a candle to her,

I shall prove I have the beauty
and splendor to capture
the hearts of everyone.
